Reviews.Title: Cool phone
Reviews.Author: Guerro Boii
Reviews.Content: Good bargain, thank you for this cheap price best keyboard phone ever, by metro pcs no contract yay for the phone. :)

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed
Reviews.Author: Sarah C
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend broke the screen of his last phone, so we needed a replacement metro phone. This phone is great, it was refurbished so I was a little nervous but it works perfectly fine and looks hardly used. Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: Great and reliable little phone. Nothing fancy, but it works well as a convenient, nice phone with the basics. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: Passionate
Reviews.Content: This a great litle phone to get if you want to drop it a few times and be happy it still works. Love this phone

Reviews.Title: mp3 to !
Reviews.Author: Kasy V. Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: exellent deal. It is like new. I being very happy using it. I will look to see what else the vendor has!

Reviews.Content: do the battery comes with the phone because i need 3 phones for my daughters we are leaving at&t; because they are too high
